headline: Have $1,000? These 3 Stocks Could Be Bargain Buys for 2025 and Beyond
summary: Lululemon, American Tower, and UiPath look like great deals in an expensive stock market.

headline: American Tower (AMT) Margin Surge Reinforces Quality Narrative, But Balance Sheet Challenges Persist
summary: American Tower (AMT) posted a stellar year with earnings up 45.9%, considerably higher than its 5-year average growth of 4.2% per year. Net profit margins also improved to 28.1% from 20.1% in the previous year, and earnings are forecast to grow at 9.6% annually even as revenue growth of 4.7% trails the broader US market. Despite a strong run in profitability and margins, future growth expectations remain more subdued. This puts the spotlight on how investors will weigh recent momentum against...

headline: Is Now the Right Time to Revisit American Tower After Recent 8% Share Price Dip?
summary: Ever wonder if a giant like American Tower is actually trading at a bargain, or if the market has already priced in all the upside? If you are curious about whether now could be the right time to consider this stock, you are not alone. Despite its reputation as a steady player, American Tower's shares have dropped 6.3% over the past week and are down 8.0% in the past month, reflecting shifting sentiment in the real estate sector. Investors are eyeing these moves and wondering if there is...
